ygData.subject: RE: [shadowknight] Hey There!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Start Working on your 2Hd Swordsmanship. All our good weapons are such. Also, be sure you keep up on ALL your spell casting skills (once you get them) Found
ygData.messageBody:
Start Working on your 2Hd Swordsmanship. All our good weapons are such.
Also, be sure you keep up on ALL your spell casting skills (once you get
them) Found that out the hard way :)

Sthiel
Cazic Thule

-----Original Message-----
From: James Jones [mailto:jjones@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 27, 2000 4:41 AM
To: shadowknight@egroups.com
Subject: [shadowknight] Hey There!!!


Hi,

My names James and I thought I'de just say Hi!

I've been playing for around 2 weeks now and have built up a level 8 nearly
9 Shadow Knight. Great fun all round!!!

James(Goraknor the Troll)
